member.name: M:Mahmoud_Restaurant.Controllers.AccountController.UpdateProfile(Mahmoud_Restaurant.Models.UpdateProfileRequest)
member.remarks: This endpoint allows adding a dish to the user's basket by specifying the dish ID.
member.param: The ID of the dish to be added.
member.returns: Response indicating whether the dish was successfully added.
